roleset.name: impossible to determine the meaning of

role.descr: decoded data, what couldn't be gleaned from Arg1

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: The minutiea of such an undertaking are indecipherable .

propbank.arg: The minutiea of such an undertaking

example.name: With arg0
example.text: The text " in German , Hebrew , and Latin " was indecipherable to me .

propbank.arg: The text " in German , Hebrew , and Latin "

example.name: With arg2
example.text: Whether or not Lorraine had , in fact , planned on doing this beforehand or not , was indecipherable from her tone .

propbank.arg: Whether or not Lorraine had , in fact , planned on doing this beforehand or not

roleset.note: INDECIPHERABLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to decipher-v.01. (from indecipherable.01-j)
